attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for child killers that deliberately murder a child.
attributes.additional_details: Children deserve the ultimate protection of the state to put a stop to these child murders that are now happening at an alarming rate.
attributes.background: Bring back the death penalty for child killers.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Bring back death penalty for child killers and mass murderers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602898
